mapper.select: SELECT bc.author as AuthorComment, bc.content as Content, bc.id as ComentarioBlogID, bc.creation_date as fechaDate , bu.login as usuarioLogin, bc.author as pruebita, bu.name as nameUsuario, bu.lastname as lastNameUsuario FROM BLOG as b , BLOG_COMMENT as bc, BLOG_USUARIO as bu WHERE b.id = bc.blog_id and bu.login = bc.author and b.title = #{title} ORDER BY fechaDate DESC
